title: X-Men: The Ravages of the Apocalypse Playthrough -- Part 1
description: Well, I saw this in the RetroAhoy Quake video ([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OipJYWhMi3k](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OipJYWhMi3k)) which was pretty cool and I wanted to check this out. Can't believe it exists. I'm not sure what I expected, but I feel like it's actually kiiiinda cool.
